page.title: 04Women's Institute,Longtown.
page.content: {Longtown}Women's Institute is one of seven neighbouring W.I.s ,known as the "Border Group".They meet on the 2nd Monday of each month with a programme of entertainment and instructional evenings,always including time for tea and a chat.The year'calendar included Oil-Painting,Jewelry-making,Gardening, Cake-Icing,Fashion Shows,Victorian Films of Carlisle,Life on a remote Scottish Island,and a tour of Robertson's Bakery.Longtown W.I. has entered Sports Teams for County Darts,Bowling,and Rounders Tornaments.Some ladies join the Family Walks on Summer Sundays.There are competitions in Cookery and Crafts,both locally and further afield.There is a link with a W.I.in Canada with correspondence each year.Members enjoy a Birthday Party,Outing,and Border Group meeting.
